Text:
Originally from nyaa.eu in Japanese: "クドわふたー 初回限定版"

Seems like piratebay removes links.

It also seems piratebay doesn't update seeders from other trackers, the seeds/leech is 0 probably because the torrent doesn't include the PB tracker.

Try googling the Japanese name (above) and nyaa.eu to see the actual number of seeds and leechers.

quick note on how to run Japanese games

just google "applocale japanese" and check out the hongfire forum post, makes it super easy
